What is Cali Co. Cat Cafe?

Welcome to Cali Co. Cat Cafe, where feline charm meets your coffee cup! Nestled in the heart of Bakersfield, California, we've crafted a unique haven for cat lovers and caffeine enthusiasts alike. Our concept is simple yet extraordinary – a delightful fusion of a traditional cafe experience with the playful charm of our adorable cats. Join us in celebrating great company, delicious flavors, and the delightful antics of our whiskered friends at Cali Co. Cat Cafe!

Need to get in touch?

Got questions or just want to share a purr-fect moment? Reach out to us at our email below or message us on our social medias. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you with anything you need, from inquiries about our menu to booking your next memorable event at our cafe!
